channel.title: New character HELP
channel.description:
So I've downloaded the client and managed to make a server and log in, but every-time i log in i am in the same spot with max lvl's and a bronze pickax. I've tried editing a few character files but to no avail. What i want is to be able to have people including myself start out as new characters, can anyone help me?
P.S. I'm using the newest version of moparscape with aryan.

item.title: New character HELP
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame
item.description:
@RuneForceGame wrote:

Find a Startup/Init method, or just search the username in a class. i think

Read full topic

item.title: New character HELP
item.dc:creator: @emperor1975 emperor1975
item.description:
@emperor1975 wrote:

Its simple just go into playerassistant.java file
and you have to find something like this
http://prntscr.com/3ruxk8
just remove addskillxp
and edit the items you want to be added to the new starter

Read full topic
